properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prbhu sriyesu prabhu sri yesu jaya sali Sarva srusti kartayatane sakala jeevula palakudu yese{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sa kala prajalaku siluvalo Yesu Swarganagariki margamu joopi Randi jeeva jalamu tragudanuchu Nindaina premato pilchu chunnadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jeevana jyothiai veluguchunnadu Premato mammula veliginchinaadu Papaandakaramunu bapinaadu Pavana parachenu mammulanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Papulu paschatapamu nonddi Papula prapakudesuni jeri Papa vimuktini bonddi meeru Pavanudesuni sankertinchudi{/lang-eng}
